resources.string: Harry Potter Quiz is simply a game, a game that determine how much PotterHead you are, there are 8 questions, Every question have a score of 1 point, collect as many points as you can to prove you are a REAL PotterHead, at the top of the screen you will find your current score out of 8 also the result of your answer for the current question either a correct answer message if you answer the question correctly, or the right answer if your answer is wrong.\nat the end of the Quiz you will find your final score along side with another surprise.. reach the end and you will figure it out.
Are you ready to start The QUIZ!!
